page.title: 14TOURISM SURVEY (2)
page.content:
The next question asked was about the purpose of the visit to this area and, as anticipated, the majority of people were sightseeing or spending the day on the beach. Of the residents interviewed the majority were in the area for business reasons. Most of the visitors interviewed had been on holiday in Jersey before.
Gorey is a place that most people felt was worth a day-long visit. The most{popular attraction}in the area was the{Jersey Potteries}followed by {Mont Orgueil Castle}and{St.Catherine's {Breakwater.}Some people had not visited any of these places. Eight times as many people had enjoyed their visit as opposed to those who only found it satisfactory or disappointing.
